languages.text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось..." {n}Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф недоверчиво хмыкает.{/n} "В любом случае, "Обет Императора" нижайше благодарит вас за сей разговор и уделенное время. Спокойного плавания меж звезд, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось..." {n}Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф недоверчиво хмыкает.{/n} "В любом случае, "Обет Императора" нижайше благодарит вас за сей разговор и уделенное время. Спокойного плавания меж звезд, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось..." {n}Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф недоверчиво хмыкает.{/n} "В любом случае, "Обет Императора" нижайше благодарит вас за сей разговор и уделенное время. Спокойного плавания меж звезд, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it turned out... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n}"Anyway, Oath of the Emperor humbly thanks you for this conversation and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"So this is how it turned out... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n}"Anyway, Oath of the Emperor humbly thanks you for this conversation and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"So, this is how things turned out... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n}"Anyway, Oath of the Emperor humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"So, this is how things turned out... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n}"Anyway, Oath of the Emperor humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"So, this is how things turned out... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: « Voilà donc ce qui s'est passé... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff émet un grognement sceptique.{/n} Quoi qu'il en soit, le Serment de l'Empereur vous remercie pour cette information et vos efforts, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous souhaite de naviguer sans encombre dans les eaux sombres des océans d'étoiles, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà donc ce qui s'est passé... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff émet un grognement sceptique.{/n} Quoi qu'il en soit, le Serment de l'Empereur vous remercie pour cette information et vos efforts, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous souhaite de naviguer sans encombre dans les eaux sombres des océans d'étoiles, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: “原来是这样……”{n}埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫怀疑地哼了一声。{/n}“无论如何，帝皇誓约号谦卑地感谢您提供的信息，感谢您的宝贵时间，行商浪人。祝您在星际间的黑暗水域中一帆风顺，大人。”
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “原来是这样……”{n}埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫怀疑地哼了一声。{/n}“无论如何，帝皇誓约号谦卑地感谢您提供的信息，感谢您的宝贵时间，行商浪人。祝您在星际间的黑暗水域中一帆风顺，大人。”

languages.text: "So ist es also gekommen ..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff summt skeptisch.{/n} "Wie dem auch sei, die Eid des Imperators dankt Euch demütig für diese Information und für Eure Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich wünsche Euch eine sichere Reise durch die dunklen Wasser zwischen den Sternen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "So ist es also gekommen ... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff summt skeptisch.{/n} "Wie dem auch sei, die Eid des Imperators dankt Euch demütig für diese Information und für Eure Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich wünsche Euch eine sichere Reise durch die dunklen Wasser zwischen den Sternen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: «Así que eso es lo que ha sucedido...». {n}Erbreght ap Daeff murmura escépticamente.{/n} «De todos modos, el Voto del Emperador le agradece que nos haya transmitido esta información y por dedicarnos un momento de su tiempo, Comerciante Independiente. Que tenga un viaje seguro a través de las oscuras aguas entre las estrellas, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Así que eso es lo que ha sucedido... {n}Erbreght ap Daeff murmura escépticamente.{/n} «De todos modos, el Voto del Emperador le agradece que nos haya transmitido esta información y por dedicarnos un momento de su tiempo, Comerciante Independiente. Que tenga un viaje seguro a través de las oscuras aguas entre las estrellas, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: 「これが事の成り行きです…{n}エルブレート・アプ・ダエフは疑い深そうに鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「いずれにせよ、『皇帝の誓い』号は、この情報と時間を割いてくれたことに感謝します、自由開拓者。星間の闇の水域を安全に航海されるよう願っております、陛下」
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「これが事の成り行きです…{n}エルブレート・アプ・ダエフは疑い深そうに鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「いずれにせよ、『皇帝の誓い』号は、この情報と時間を割いてくれたことに感謝します、自由開拓者。星間の闇の水域を安全に航海されるよう願っております、陛下」

languages.text: "Demek öyle..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff, ima ile mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Neyse. İmparator'un Andı, vakti ve sağladığı bu bilgi için zatıaliniz Hür Tacir'e içten teşekkürlerini sunar. Yıldızların arasındaki karanlık sularda güvenle ilerlemenizi temenni ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff hums sceptically.{/n} "Anyway, the Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
